name: The River
summary: 著名的野生动物专家、探险家、野生动物电视纪录片解说员Emmet Cole（Bruce Greenwood扮演）在准备拍摄一部反映亚马逊热带雨林的新节目时神秘失踪。六个月之后，Emmet的妻子Tess和儿子Linclon抱着最后一线希望，集结了一支由他的朋友和节目摄制组成员组成的探险队，踏上了寻找Emmet的危险旅程。摄像师Clarke以将这段经历拍成纪录片的条件资助并参加了这次探险。观众将随着他的摄像机的视角，一同见证亚马逊人迹罕至的神秘地带最不可思议的事情……

eps.name: Magus
eps.desc: Dr. Emmet Cole, adventurer and TV personality goes missing deep in the Amazon. After a search for him, his family and friends hold a memorial service in his honor. His wife, Tess, tries to face the reality of her husband death, while her son, Lincoln, is more than ready to move on. Six months later Emmet's location beacon catches a mysterious signal. Tess and Lincoln join her and Emmet's film crew on a journey through the Amazon to find him.

eps.name: Marbeley
eps.desc:
The spirit of Dr. Cole gets into Jahel, the message is clear, go home! Tess then is determined to go and find clues to Cole's whereabouts. While on the mission, they discover a tree with children dolls that is suspected to guard of the "spirit of the abandoned girl" who drowned in the river. Then, a member of the crew goes missing and they realize they have to survive the nightmare of an angry spirit.
